about_the_game:
VR RTS

A classic RTS in VR. Featuring a completely new way of interacting with a RTS game. While keeping the basics like base building, resource gathering and crushing your enemy with overwhelming firepower. As the commander you stand in a futuristic war room. You can move around on the vast battlefield, or scale it down for a better overview.

Interaction

Your hands will be very powerful, but you can only use two of them. Making them the most valuable resource in your arsenal.

There are two movement systems. With the first you can use both hands, to scale, rotate or move the battlefield. With the second you can use one hand, to slide along the terrain.

Scale is important. On a scaled up terrain, you can stack structures accurately to improve their abilities. On a scaled down terrain, you can get an overview of the battlefield.

Physically grab objects to interact with them. Throw your units to move them to the right area. Grab missiles out of the air and throw them at the enemy. Construct a unit by dragging its icon onto the battlefield.

Optimize between firepower and resource gathering

Stacking tower blocks will increase the performance of the turret on the top. With a yellow missile on top, blue blocks in the stack will increase missile damage while yellow blocks will increase explosion area. The height of the stack will determine the range.

By using the correct stack, mining resources can be done efficiently. Blue blocks increase the mining of the primary resource, while yellow blocks increase the mining of the secondary resource. While in the stack the blue and yellow blocks cannot fight. Tactically switching between gathering resources and combat at the right time could make all the difference.

Story driven game balance

In every mission you can unlock new weapons and events. The difficulty of a mission can vary a lot depending on which events have been unlocked in other missions. Should you ever get stuck, find some help in one of the other missions by completing secondary objectives.

Features

  • Asymmetric level design. (both sides have different starting conditions)

  • Build for VR only. With unique VR interactions

  • Campaign driven RTS, focus on single player

  • Physics based. Most projectiles, friendly units and neutral items can be grabbed by the player

  • RTS basics : Fog of war, Tech tree, Base building, Superweapons, Resources and a large amount of enemies

  • Free demo

short_description: A classic RTS in VR, where you command a high-tech force against a battle-hardened enemy. Tactically stack your structures in the right order to switch between firepower and resource gathering. Accurately throw reinforcements towards a combat zone. The war room of the future awaits you!
